body: I didn't save the stack trace but I remember `PyEval_GetBuiltins` in the stack; I think it might be crashing in this call https://github.com/pybind/pybind11/blob/326deef2ae6c535c2b1838fd7404579b3fe497b7/include/pybind11/detail/internals.h#L142
